        public Clause.ClauseState reWatch(Variable[] variables,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Clause> removeLater)
        Sucht ein neues watched literal fuer diese Klausel
        Parameters:
        variables - - der aktuelle Variablenvektor
        lit - - das Literal, das belegt wurde
        removeLater -
        Returns:
        den Status der Suche (SUCCESS, EMPTY, SAT oder UNIT) during this process the clause could have 3 watched literals, they should be removed by another function.

      • initUnknownWatched

        public int initUnknownWatched(Variable[] variables)
        Initiates the watched variables when it is unknown if there are free variables
        Parameters:
        variables -
        Returns:
        -1 if the new clause is a unit clause,-2 if the new clause is sat, Integer.MaxValue if no bagjump is needed, else the needed backjumplvl
